Text: Serious synch problems on my standalone divX-dvd player. I tried running this file through Dr. DivX, which made the synch problems worse.
confirm problem with sync. i try write on dvd and watch but still not going well

There's nothing wrong with this. You're just fucking retarded. Probably just watched the music sequence during the starting credits, which is (I suppose) intentionally unsynched. The rest of the film is just fine.
awesome movie like I remembered it and there is nothing wrong with this movie's audio
